mapper.select: /* MovieMapper.searchMovie */ SELECT X.movieCd , X.movieNm , X.openDt , Y.nationNm AS nations , X.showTm , X.content , X.mainImg FROM tb_movie X JOIN tb_movie_nations Y ON X.nations = Y.nationCd WHERE REPLACE(movieNm, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{param}, ' ', ''), '%') OR movieCd IN ( SELECT movieCd FROM tb_character_roll WHERE REPLACE(characterNm, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{param}, ' ', ''), '%') OR REPLACE(realNm, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{param}, ' ', ''), '%'))
/* MovieMapper.getBoxoffice */ SELECT reportDt , ranking , movieCd , movieNm , audience , mainImg FROM tb_daily_boxoffice ORDER BY reportDt DESC, ranking LIMIT 10

/* MovieMapper.getMovieInfoDetail */ SELECT X.movieCd , X.movieNm , X.openDt , Y.nationNm AS nations , X.janres , X.showTm , X.content , X.mainImg FROM tb_movie X JOIN tb_movie_nations Y ON X.nations = Y.nationCd WHERE X.movieCd = #{movieCd}
/* MovieMapper.listJanres */ SELECT X.janreNm AS janres FROM tb_movie_janres X WHERE X.janreCd IN ( ${janres} )
/* MovieMapper.listCharacter */ SELECT X.movieRoll , X.characterNm , X.realNm , X.characterImg FROM tb_character_roll X WHERE X.movieCd = #{movieCd}

/* MovieMapper.getMovieGrade */ SELECT ( 0.5*X.grade0_5 + 1*X.grade1 + 1.5*X.grade1_5 + 2*X.grade2 + 2.5*X.grade2_5 + 3*X.grade3 + 3.5*X.grade3_5 + 4*X.grade4 + 4.5*X.grade4_5 + 5*X.grade5 ) / ( X.grade0_5 + X.grade1 + X.grade1_5 + X.grade2 + X.grade2_5 + X.grade3 + X.grade3_5 + X.grade4 + X.grade4_5 + X.grade5) AS grade FROM tb_grade_report X WHERE X.movieCd = #{movieCd}
